<<BR>>Install the Router ADVertisement Daemon:
<<BR>>`sudo apt-get install radvd radvdump`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Enable IPv6 Forwarding:
<<BR>>`sed 's/#net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=1/net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=1/g' /etc/sysctl.conf | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.conf`
<<BR>>`echo "net.ipv6.conf.default.forwarding=1" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf`
<<BR>>`sudo sysctl -p`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Create the configuration file:
<<BR>>`sudo nano `<nowiki>[[attachment:radvd.conf|-etc-radvd.conf]]</nowiki>
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Start the daemon:
<<BR>>`sudo service radvd restart || sudo /etc/init.d/radvd restart`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Confirm the configuration:
<<BR>>`sudo /usr/sbin/radvdump -d 4`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
